newsitem.title: USA: IKOS says comfortable with FY97 EPS range.
newsitem.headline: IKOS says comfortable with FY97 EPS range.

text.p: IKOS Systems Inc Chief Executive Officer Ramon Nunez on Monday said he was comfortable with analysts' estimates that the company's fiscal 1997 earnings would range from $1.03 to $1.10 a share.
In the fiscal year ended September 28, 1996, IKOS reported earnings of $0.69 a share, including an extraordinary tax benefit, and $0.30 a share excluding the beneft.
Speaking at a Robertson Stephens & Co technology conference in San Francisco, Nunez estimated the total size of IKOS's market at about $800 million in 1997.
IKOS makes advanced simulation systems for the application-specific integrated circuit and systems design markets.
He said IKOS has not experienced a slowdown in demand.
"We've seen a nice growth over the last three years," Nunez said.
